sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using inverse matrices
message_1:
Assuming that x, y and z are non-zero real numbers, solve the following system of equations using inverse matrices:

3x + 2y - z = 4

4x - y + 3z = 7

2x + 5y - 2z = 1
message_2:
To solve the given system of linear equations using inverse matrices, we first represent the system in matrix form AX = B, where A is the matrix of coefficients, X is the column matrix of variables (x, y, z), and B is the column matrix of constants.

A = | 3  2 -1 |
    | 4 -1  3 |
    | 2  5 -2 |

X = | x |
    | y |
    | z |

B = | 4 |
    | 7 |
    | 1 |

Now, we need to find the inverse of matrix A, denoted as A^(-1). To do this, we first find the determinant of A.

det(A) = 3(-1)(-2) + 2(3)(2) + (-1)(4)(5) - (-1)(-1)(2) - 2(4)(-2) - 3(3)(5)
       = 6 + 12 - 20 + 4 + 16 - 45
       = 18 - 49
       = -31

Since the determinant is non-zero, the inverse of A exists. Now, we find the adjoint of A and then divide each element by the determinant to find A^(-1).

adj(A) = | (-1)(-2) - (3)(5)   (3)(2) - (-1)(-2)  (2)(-1) - (5)(3) |
         | (4)(-2) - (2)(5)   (2)(3) - (3)(-1)   (4)(3) - (5)(4)  |
         | (4)(5) - (2)(-1)   (2)(-1) - (3)(4)   (4)(2) - (3)(2)  |

adj(A) = | -13  4 -17 |
         | -6   7 -8  |
         |  22 -10 2  |

Now, we find A^(-1) by dividing each element of adj(A) by det(A).

A^(-1) = 1/(-31) * | -13  4 -17 |
                   | -6   7 -8  |
                   |  22 -10 2  |

Now, we can find the solution matrix X by multiplying A^(-1) with B.

X = A^(-1) * B

X = 1/(-31) * | -13  4 -17 | * | 4 |
              | -6   7 -8  |   | 7 |
              |  22 -10 2  |   | 1 |

X = 1/(-31) * | (-13)(4) + (4)(7) + (-17)(1) |
              | (-6)(4) + (7)(7) + (-8)(1)  |
              | (22)(4) + (-10)(7) + (2)(1) |

X = 1/(-31) * | -52 + 28 - 17 |
              | -24 + 49 - 8  |
              |  88 - 70 + 2  |

X = 1/(-31) * | -41 |
              |  17  |
              |  20  |

X = | 41/31  |
    | -17/31 |
    | -20/31 |

So, the solution to the given system of equations is:

x = 41/31
y = -17/31
z = -20/31
